targets.rawSql:
select  city as Ort, canton as Kanton, temperature as "°C", pressure as mBar, humidity as Feuchte,
 wind_direction as "W.Richtung", DATE_FORMAT(time_inserted,"%H:%m:%s") as Messung  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and (time_inserted - interval 1 hour) < now()
order by dt desc
limit 3

select 
    weather_main as Himmel,
    CASE
        WHEN wind_direction >= 337.5 OR wind_direction < 22.5 THEN 'Nord'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 22.5 AND wind_direction < 67.5 THEN 'Nordost'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 67.5 AND wind_direction < 112.5 THEN 'Ost'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 112.5 AND wind_direction < 157.5 THEN 'Südost'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 157.5 AND wind_direction < 202.5 THEN 'Süd'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 202.5 AND wind_direction < 247.5 THEN 'Südwest'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 247.5 AND wind_direction < 292.5 THEN 'West'
        WHEN wind_direction >= 292.5 AND wind_direction < 337.5 THEN 'Nordwest'
    END as Windrichtung from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and dt> now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  temperature as "°C"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and dt> now() - INTERVAL 35 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  dewpoint(temperature,humidity) as "Taupunkt"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and time_inserted > now() - INTERVAL 33 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  humidity as "%"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and dt> now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  pressure as "hPa"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and dt> now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  rain_down_1h as "mm"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and dt> now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  100-clouds as "%"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and dt> now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  wind_speed as "km/h"  from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and dt> now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE
order by dt desc
limit 1

select  temperature as Mittel, 
        temperature_min as Min,
        temperature_max as Max,
        dewpoint(temperature,humidity) as Taupunkt,
        time_inserted as time from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(time_inserted) 
ORDER BY time_inserted

select  humidity as Feucht, 
        time_inserted as time from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(time_inserted) 
ORDER BY time_inserted

select  pressure as Druck, 
        time_inserted as time from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(time_inserted) 
ORDER BY time_inserted

select  clouds as Wolken, 
        time_inserted as Zeit from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(time_inserted) 
ORDER BY time_inserted

select  rain_down_1h as Niederschlaf, 
        time_inserted as time from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(time_inserted) 
ORDER BY time_inserted

select  wind_speed as Wind, 
        time_inserted as time from weather_data 
 where canton="$Kanton" and city = "$Ort" and $__timeFilter(time_inserted) 
ORDER BY time_inserted

panels.title: Extremwerte Klicken sie auf die Spalte nach der Sie sortieren wollen

panels.description: sort by column clicking on the column by which you want to sort

targets.rawSql:
select  city as Ort, temperature as Temp, wind_speed*3.6 as Wind, rain_down_1h as Niederschlag, 
        DATE_FORMAT(time_inserted, '%H:%i') as Zeit, time_inserted, now()
        from weather_data 
where (time_inserted + interval 30 minute )  > now() and (country= "CH" or country ="VA")
ORDER BY temperature

panels.title: Extremwerte

list.definition: select canton  from  weather_data where dt> now() - interval 2 hour and (country = "CH" or country="VA")
list.name: Kanton
list.query: select canton  from  weather_data where dt> now() - interval 2 hour and (country = "CH" or country="VA")

list.definition: select distinct city from  weather_data  where (dt> now() - interval 2 hour)  and canton="$Kanton"
list.name: Ort
list.query: select distinct city from  weather_data  where (dt> now() - interval 2 hour)  and canton="$Kanton"
